sense.gloss: to step into (e.g. someone else's territory), to break into, to raid
to come to grips with, to get to the core of

sdata.j: ↑詳↑↓くわ↓しいことが↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓わかるまでは、あわててその↑場↑↓ば↓に|ふみこむ|な。↑見当↑↓けんとう↓がつくまでは、↑慎重↑↓しんちょう↓にかまえておれ。
sdata.e: Don't rush into the situation until you have all the details; hold your horses until you know where you are going.
